title: New Phase Of Pandemic Met With Confusion And Exhaustion
description: The United States has reached yet another turning point in this pandemic—one that may feel particularly unrelenting and confusing.

itunes:title: New Phase Of Pandemic Met With Confusion And Exhaustion
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: The government's public health messaging in a constantly evolving pandemic proves to be confusing and exhausting.
itunes:subtitle: The government's public health messaging in a constantly evolving pandemic proves to be confusing and exhausting.
content:encoded: The United States has reached yet another turning point in this pandemic—one that may feel particularly unrelenting and confusing.
